name: Centre for Crop Health and Protection
headAddress: Centre for Crop Health and Protection
goal: Improve agricultural crop productivity through the development and introduction of innovation especially in relation to crop health and protection.
interests: Agriculture, Business and Industry, Climate Action, Consumers, Digital economy and society, Education and training, Energy, Environment, Food Safety, International co-operation and development, Public Health, Research and innovation
euInitiatives: All that relate to innovation and developments in agricultural crop productivity.
